text: Black Forest Metal is the seventh full-length album by the Industrial metal band Hanzel und Gretyl. It was released on Metropolis Records, on November 11, 2014. The album was successfully funded via a PledgeMusic crowdfunding campaign on June 26, 2014.http://www.pledgemusic.com/projects/hanzelundgretyl/updates/37681 == Track listing == (Note: Songs are out of order on the back sleeve of CD case, but inside the booklet they are in the proper order. Listed here is the proper order now.) == Personnel == * Kaizer Von Loopy – vocals, guitar, programming * Vas Kallas – lead vocals, bass == References == == External links == *Official Hanzel Und Gretyl Website *Official MySpace page *Metropolis Records Category:Hanzel und Gretyl albums Category:2014 albums Category:Metropolis Records albums Category:German-language albums
title: Black Forest Metal
